data.title: Christian Brando
data.text:
AKA Christian Devi Brando

Born: 11-May-1958

Birthplace: Los Angeles, CA

Died: 26-Jan-2008

Location of death: Los Angeles, CA [1]

Cause of death: Pneumonia

Remains: Buried, Kalama Oddfellows Cemetery, Kalama, WA

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: Multiracial

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Relative

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Son of Marlon Brando

Shot and killed Dag Drollet, the allegedly abusive boyfriend of his pregnant sister Cheyenne.

[1] Hollywood Presbyterian Medical Center, Los Angeles, CA.

Father: Marlon Brando (actor)

Mother: Anna Kashfi

Sister: Tarita Cheyenne Brando (b. 1970, d. 1995 suicide)

Girlfriend: Bonny Lee Bakley (ex-)

Wife: Mary McKenna (m. 28-Jan-1981, div. 1987)

Wife: Deborah Presley (m. 16-Oct-2004, div. 2005)

Manslaughter of his sister Cheyenne's boyfriend (16-May-1990)

Unlawful Possession of a Firearm (16-May-1990)

Took the Fifth (25-Oct-2005)

Kidnapped by his mother, taken to Mexico (1972)

Inmate: Los Angeles County Jail 1990

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Wishful Thinking (1990)

New!
